name: TERMINAL (itch)
description:
You and a creature living in a screen must stick together to escape a weird building in the middle of nowhere.

The creature can transfer from one screen to the other as a signal on a wired or wireless connection

This was a submission for Global Game Jam 2017 under the theme "Waves".

As it currently is, the game is too short (It can be speed-run in less than 2 minutes). There is yet a lot to explore in the game mechanics, so when I get more time to spare on it, I will add more levels, may be enhance the visual aspect and certainly add more sound effects.

Controls: Press Tab to switch player, Space to interact with the world and P to take a screenshot.

Tools used:

  • Unity
  • Tiled (& Tiled2Unity)
  • Blender
  • MagicaVoxel
